'''The Lonely Mountain Band''' is a [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]-inspired musical project and ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'' kinship made up of members of the Celtic rock band Fathom.

==Discography==
===Full-length albums===
* ''[[Beyond the Western Seas]]'' (2010)
* ''[[Second Breakfast]]'' (2011)
* ''[[Song of the Dwarves]]'' (2012)

===Singles===
* ''The Night's Watch'' (2013)
* ''Beowulf Awaits'' (2014)
* ''Stand by the Grey Stone'' (2015)
